BoW.from sentence:
Baselines
BoW
This model is based on a logistic regression classifier with conventional binary BoW features .

bidirectional RNN.from sentence:
FTS- BRNN
This model is based on a bidirectional RNN with gated recurrent units ( GRU ) .

state - of - the - art model.from sentence: NTEE This model is a state - of - the - art model that uses a multi - layer perceptron classifier with the features computed using the embeddings of words and entities trained on Wikipedia using the neural network model proposed in their paper .
